mixinAccessors1.ts(18,7): error TS2611: 'validationTarget' is defined as a property in class 'mixin.(Anonymous class) & BaseClass', but is overridden here in 'MyClass' as an accessor.


==== mixinAccessors1.ts (1 errors) ====
    // https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/issues/58790
    
    function mixin<T extends { new (...args: any[]): {} }>(superclass: T) {
      return class extends superclass {
        get validationTarget(): HTMLElement {
          return document.createElement("input");
        }
      };
    }
    
    class BaseClass {
      get validationTarget(): HTMLElement {
        return document.createElement("div");
      }
    }
    
    class MyClass extends mixin(BaseClass) {
      get validationTarget(): HTMLElement {
          ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2611: 'validationTarget' is defined as a property in class 'mixin.(Anonymous class) & BaseClass', but is overridden here in 'MyClass' as an accessor.
        return document.createElement("select");
      }
    }
